name: Sun Chuan
statement: I have always believed that nothing is impossible. I have a strong learning ability, even if I encounter unknown problems or enter unknown areas. I can quickly build up my understanding of a new technology and make use of my knowledge flexibly. I love and enjoy the process of learning, creating, and problem-solving because once a problem is solved, its a huge motivation for me.

events.title: Born in Baotou China
events.detail: Lived in a small [beatiful villege] for seven years.

events.title: Moved to the City [Baotou] for better education
events.detail: I was almost always at top 5 of my class. Played a lot of video games.

events.title: Education at [University of Dalian Jiaotong University] in China
events.detail: Because of my strong interest in Programming and English language, I Majored in Software Engineering and English

Developed a mobile game using JavaScript language and Cocos2D game engine.
For the bachelor thesis, I did a C++ and python
